0.1.0.name: connect20/Netzarbeiter_ConfigCustomOption
0.1.0.description: This very small extension fixes a bug in the quote model, where adding configurable products with custom options under certain circumstances led to "ghost" items in the cart.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
